mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT t.id splitId, t.number, 1 deliverType, t.total_amount totalAmount, t.apply_money applyMoney, t.create_date, m.address shipAddress FROM dj_deliver_split_deliver t,dj_member_address m WHERE t.receipt_num = #{receiptNumber} and (t.address_id=m.id or t.house_id=m.house_id) UNION ALL SELECT t1.id splitId, t1.number, 2 deliverType, t1.total_amount totalAmount, t1.apply_money applyMoney, t1.create_date, m.address shipAddress FROM dj_repair_mend_deliver t1,dj_member_address m WHERE t1.receipt_num = #{receiptNumber} and (t1.address_id=m.id or t1.house_id=m.house_id) )tt order by tt.create_date desc
